mapper.select:
select count(*) as "count" from board where del_ny = 'N'
and category = #{ category }
mapper.update: update board set count = count + 1 where board_no = #{boardNo} and del_ny = 'N'
mapper.select: select board_no , category_title as "category" , board_title , mem_nickname , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , board_content , count , table_no from board b join category c on (b.category = c.category_no) join member using(mem_no) where board_no = #{boardNo}

select count(*) as "count" from board join member using(mem_no) where del_ny = 'N'
and mem_nickname
and board_title
and board_content
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select board_no , board_title , board_content , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , modify_date , count , del_ny , category_title as "category" , mem_nickname , table_no from board b join member using (mem_no) join category c on (b.category = c.category_no) where del_ny = 'N'
and mem_nickname
and board_title
and board_content
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into board ( board_no , board_title , board_content , category , mem_no ) values ( seq_board.nextval , #{ boardTitle } , #{ boardContent } , #{ category} , 1 )
insert into upload ( upload_no , origin_name , modify_name , group_board_no , table_no ) values ( seq_upload.nextval , #{ originName } , #{ changeName } , 1 , 10 )
